subject: https://www.fitbit.com/privacy
text:
The part below, is completely unacceptable;


"Fitbit may also share your personal information with companies who
provide services such as information processing, order fulfillment,
product delivery, customer data management, customer research and the
like."

sounds to me as: "we may share your personal information with
complanies that do information processing .. downloading a file or
accessing a database is processing information, so .. anyone.?"

moreover, I have a mail thread where I ask support to *delete* my account.
They *deactivated* it.

-- 
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
